original_text: During the time that the person is a Nazirite, they are holy because they belong to the Lord.
korean_text: 자기의 몸을 구별하는 모든 날 동안 그는 여호와께 거룩한 자니라

sentences.original_text: During the time that the person is a Nazirite
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람이 나지르 사람인 기간 동안

sentences.original_text: because they belong to the Lord
